name: Pchnijdolino
description:
Huginn had a little adventure with his Pendolino train when trying to arrive at Sensei Game Jam 2016, so we held a game jam in our trains to make a game about him.

This is Pchnijdolino, where you're Huginn who's trying to recruit people to push his Pendolino, so he can arrive on the game jam on time!
